trans-unit.source: Register for Twitter authentication | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Register for Twitter authentication | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Twitter authentication with your Azure Mobile Services application.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Twitter authentication with your Azure Mobile Services application.

trans-unit.source: Register your apps for Twitter login with Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Register your apps for Twitter login with Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to register your apps to be able to use Twitter to authenticate with Azure Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to register your apps to be able to use Twitter to authenticate with Azure Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] This tutorial is about [Azure Mobile Services](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/mobile-services/), a solution to help you build scalable mobile applications for any platform.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] This tutorial is about [Azure Mobile Services](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/mobile-services/), a solution to help you build scalable mobile applications for any platform.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Services makes it easy to sync data, authenticate users, and send push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Mobile Services makes it easy to sync data, authenticate users, and send push notifications.

trans-unit.source: This page supports the Get Started with Authentication tutorial which shows how to log users into your app.
trans-unit.target: This page supports the Get Started with Authentication tutorial which shows how to log users into your app.

trans-unit.source: If this is your first experience with Mobile Services, please complete the tutorial Get Started with Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: If this is your first experience with Mobile Services, please complete the tutorial Get Started with Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: To complete the procedure in this topic, you must have a Twitter account that has a verified email address.
trans-unit.target: To complete the procedure in this topic, you must have a Twitter account that has a verified email address.

trans-unit.source: To create a new Twitter account, go to twitter.com.
trans-unit.target: To create a new Twitter account, go to twitter.com.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the Twitter Developers website, sign-in with your Twitter account credentials, and click **Create a new application**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the Twitter Developers website, sign-in with your Twitter account credentials, and click **Create a new application**.

trans-unit.source: Type the **Name**, **Description**, and **Website** values for your app, then type the URL of your mobile service appended with the path _/login/twitter_ in **Callback URL**.
trans-unit.target: Type the **Name**, **Description**, and **Website** values for your app, then type the URL of your mobile service appended with the path _/login/twitter_ in **Callback URL**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]For a .NET backend mobile service published to Azure by using Visual Studio, the redirect URL is the URL of your mobile service appended with the path _signin-twitter_.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]For a .NET backend mobile service published to Azure by using Visual Studio, the redirect URL is the URL of your mobile service appended with the path _signin-twitter_.

trans-unit.source: In this example, our mobile service would have the Callback URL ```https://todolist.azure-mobile.net/signin-twitter```.
trans-unit.target: In this example, our mobile service would have the Callback URL ```https://todolist.azure-mobile.net/signin-twitter```.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom the page, read and accept the terms, and then click **Create your Twitter application**.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom the page, read and accept the terms, and then click **Create your Twitter application**.

trans-unit.source: This registers the app displays the application details.
trans-unit.target: This registers the app displays the application details.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Keys and Access Tokens** tab in your app dashboard and make a note of the values of **Consumer key** and **Consumer secret**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Keys and Access Tokens** tab in your app dashboard and make a note of the values of **Consumer key** and **Consumer secret**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The consumer secret is an important security credential.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The consumer secret is an important security credential.

trans-unit.source: Do not share this secret with anyone or distribute it with your app.
trans-unit.target: Do not share this secret with anyone or distribute it with your app.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Settings** tab, scroll down and make sure the **Allow this application to be used to sign in with Twitter** checkbox is checked, then click **Update Settings**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Settings** tab, scroll down and make sure the **Allow this application to be used to sign in with Twitter** checkbox is checked, then click **Update Settings**.

trans-unit.source: You are now ready to use a Twitter login for authentication in your app by providing the consumer key and consumer secret values to Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: You are now ready to use a Twitter login for authentication in your app by providing the consumer key and consumer secret values to Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
